help.name: Help
help.desc: List commands, or get help for a command.

getpeercount.name: GetPeerCount
getpeercount.desc: Returns the number of connections to other nodes.

listpeer.name: ListPeer
listpeer.desc: Returns data about each connected network node.

addnode.name: AddNode
addnode.desc: Attempts add a node into the addnode list.

removenode.name: RemoveNode
removenode.desc: Attempts remove a node from the addnode list.

getgenealogy.name: GetGenealogy
getgenealogy.desc: Returns the list of ancestry and subline.

getblocklocation.name: GetBlockLocation
getblocklocation.desc: Returns the location with given block.

getblockcount.name: GetBlockCount
getblockcount.desc: Returns the number of blocks in the given fork.

getblockhash.name: GetBlockHash
getblockhash.desc: Returns hash of block in fork at <index>.

getblock.name: GetBlock
getblock.desc: Returns details of a block with given block-hash.

gettxpool.name: GetTxPool
desc: If detail==0, returns the count and total size of txs for given fork.
Otherwise,returns all transaction ids and sizes in memory pool for given fork.

removependingtx.name: RemovePendingTx
removependingtx.desc: Removes tx whose id is <txid> from txpool.
removependingtx.error: {"code":-6,"message":"This transaction is not in tx pool."}

desc: If serialized=0, returns an Object with information about <txid>.
If serialized is non-zero, returns a string that is
serialized, hex-encoded data for <txid>.

sendtransaction.name: SendTransaction
sendtransaction.desc: Submits raw transaction (serialized, hex-encoded) to local node and network.

listkey.name: ListKey
listkey.desc: Returns Object that has pubkey as keys, associated status as values.

getnewkey.name: GetNewKey
getnewkey.introduction: Returns a new pubkey for receiving payments.
desc: Returns a new pubkey for receiving payments.
If (passphrase) is specified, the key will be encrypted with (passphrase).

encryptkey.name: EncryptKey
desc: Encrypts the key assoiciated with <passphrase>.
For encrypted key, changes the passphrase for (oldpassphrase) to <passphrase>

lockkey.name: LockKey
lockkey.introduction: Removes the encryption key from memory, locking the key.
desc: Removes the encryption key from memory, locking the key.
After calling this method, you will need to call unlockkey again.
before being able to call any methods which require the key to be unlocked.

unlockkey.name: UnlockKey
desc: If (timeout) > 0,stores the wallet decryption key in memory for (timeout) seconds.
before being able to call any methods which require the key to be locked.

importprivkey.name: ImportPrivKey
importprivkey.introduction: Adds a private key (as returned by dumpprivkey) to your wallet.
desc: Adds a private key (as returned by dumpprivkey) to your wallet.
If (passphrase) is specified, the key will be encrypted with (passphrase).

response.name: pubkey
response.desc: public key with hex number system

importkey.name: ImportKey
importkey.desc: Reveals the serialized key corresponding to <pubkey>.

response.name: pubkey
response.desc: public key with hex number system

exportkey.name: ExportKey
exportkey.desc: Reveals the serialized key corresponding to <pubkey>.

addnewtemplate.name: AddNewTemplate
addnewtemplate.desc: Returns encoded address for the given template id.

importtemplate.name: ImportTemplate
importtemplate.desc: Returns encoded address for the given template.

exporttemplate.name: ExportTemplate
exporttemplate.desc: Returns encoded address for the given template.

resyncwallet.name: ResyncWallet
desc: If (address) is not specified, resync wallet's tx for each address.
If (address) is specified, resync wallet's tx for the address.

getbalance.name: GetBalance
desc: Get balance of address.
If (address) is not specified, returns the balance for wallet's each address.
If (address) is specified, returns the balance in the address.

listtransaction.name: ListTransaction
desc: If (offset) < 0,returns last (count) transactions,
If (offset) >= 0,returns up to (count) most recent transactions skipping the first (offset) transactions.

count.desc: transaction count. If not set, return 10 tx

offset.desc: query offset. If not set, from 0

error: {"code":-6,"message":"Negative, zero or out of range count"}

sendfrom.name: SendFrom
desc: <amount> and <txfee> are real and rounded to the nearest 0.000001
Returns transaction id

createtransaction.name: CreateTransaction
desc: <amount> and <txfee> are real and rounded to the nearest 0.000001.
Returns serialized tx.

signtransaction.name: SignTransaction
desc: Returns json object with keys:
hex : raw transaction with signature(s) (hex-encoded string)
complete : true if transaction has a complete set of signature (false if not)

signmessage.name: SignMessage
signmessage.desc: Sign a message with the private key of an pubkey

listaddress.name: ListAddress
listaddress.desc: List all of addresses from pub keys and template ids

exportwallet.name: ExportWallet
exportwallet.desc: Export all of keys and templates from wallet to a specified file in json format.

example.response: Wallet file has been saved at: /Users/Loading/a.txt

importwallet.name: ImportWallet
importwallet.desc: Import keys and templates from archived file in json format to wallet.
error: {"code":-401,"message":"Data format is not correct, check it and try again."}

getpubkeyaddress.name: GetPubkeyAddress
getpubkeyaddress.desc: Returns encoded address for the given pubkey.

gettemplateaddress.name: GetTemplateAddress
gettemplateaddress.desc: Returns encoded address for the given template id.

maketemplate.name: MakeTemplate
maketemplate.desc: Returns encoded address for the given template id.

decodetransaction.name: DecodeTransaction
decodetransaction.desc: Return a JSON object representing the serialized, hex-encoded transaction.

getwork.name: GetWork
desc: If (prev hash) is matched with the current primary chain,returns true
If next block is not generated by proof-of-work,return false
Otherwise, returns formatted proof-of-work parameters to work on:
"prevblockhash" : prevblock hash
"prevblocktime" : prevblock timestamp
"algo" : proof-of-work algorithm: blake2b=1,...
"bits" : proof-of-work difficulty nbits
"data" : work data

result.condition: prev=matched or block is not generated by POW

submitwork.name: SubmitWork
desc: Attempts to construct and submit new block to network
Return hash of new block.
